net.tridentsdk.packets.play.in

Class PacketPlayInPlayerCreativeAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tridentsdk.server.netty.packet.InPacket
      • net.tridentsdk.packets.play.in.PacketPlayInPlayerCreativeAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Packet

    public class PacketPlayInPlayerCreativeAction
extends InPacket
    While the user is in the standard inventory (i.e., not a crafting bench) on a creative-mode server, then this packet will be sent:

    If an item is dropped into the quick bar If an item is picked up from the quick bar (item id is -1)
